body:
Hi Marcus,


This discussion probably belongs on the radiance-dev group, not general.


Sounds like Cygwin doesn't work with the current script to make 
Version.c.  Copy the following file to your ray/src/rt directory and 
try recompiling.


-Greg


------------- Version.c


/*
  * This file was created automatically during make.
  */


char VersionID[]="RADIANCE 3.6a lastmod Tue Oct 21 19:07:42 PDT 2003
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2003-November/001181.html).</sup>
